page.title: 05TRADE
page.content: Four types of trade are shops, pubs, car sales and one van rental. There are 6{shopping areas, Clipsley Lane} (33 shops with our only bank which is open twice a week) and{West End Road} (21 shops), which are the oldest areas (about 100 years), where the shops have been made in the front rooms of houses, and are spread along the lengths of the roads.{Blackbrook Road} (7 shops) is a purpose-built parade about 80 years old. The remaining three are post-war developments: {Longridge Avenue}(4 shops, 35 years old),{Chain Lane}(16 shops, 1 garage) and{Legh Road}(3 shops,2 garages),both about 20 years old. The five{pubs}are: The Ship, The Huntsman, Waggon and Horses, Owl's Nest and The Gate. There are 3 used{car sales}outlets and 1 for new cars, all along Clipsley Lane.
